A warrior cannot afford to grow idle, in the comfort of their home! Spreading one's name, as well as domain, is a clear path to glory.

Warriors of Ulric

The Warriors of Ulric are not formal regiments, but followers of the Wolf God from many fighting professions united in their service of the Ar-Ulric. As such, they often carry a diverse selection of weaponry and equipment.

The Teutogen Guard is an elite unit within the Knights of the White Wolf, forming the personal bodyguard of the High Priest of Ulric.
I must show my devotion to the [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], if I wish for him to favor me in battle. The greater my sacrifice, the greater will be the reward that the Papa Nurgle will grant me.

I must show my devotion to the ruinous patron of my warband if I wish for them to favor me in battle. The greater my sacrifice, the greater will be the reward that the ruinous powers will grant me in the wars to come.
I must show my devotion to my order if I wish for them to assist me in battle. The greater my sacrifice, the greater will be the reward that the order will grant me in the wars to come.
